verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to slap another round of tariffs on $ 200 billion of Chinese products , the latest move in an escalating trade war with Beijing] .
[ARG0: Trump] threatened to [V: slap] [ARG1: another round of tariffs on $ 200 billion of Chinese products , the latest move in an escalating trade war with Beijing] .
Trump threatened to slap another round of tariffs on $ 200 billion of Chinese products , the latest move in an [V: escalating] [ARG1: trade war] with Beijing .
